ogc.contrib.stac.extensions.eo.title: Forecast Extension
ogc.contrib.stac.extensions.eo.description: STAC Forecast Extension for STAC Items and STAC Collections.

stac-extensions.github.io_raster_v1.1.0_.title: raster Extension
stac-extensions.github.io_raster_v1.1.0_.description: STAC Raster Extension for STAC Items.

oneOf.$comment: This is the schema for STAC extension raster in Items.
This is the schema for STAC Collections.

^(?!raster:).$comment: Above, change `template` to the prefix of this extension

unit.title: Unit denomination of the pixel value

bits_per_sample.title: The actual number of bits used for this band

scale.title: multiplicator factor of the pixel value to transform into the value

offset.title: number to be added to the pixel value to transform into the value

spatial_resolution.title: Average spatial resolution (in meters) of the pixels in the band

mean.title: Mean value of all the pixels in the band

minimum.title: Minimum value of all the pixels in the band

maximum.title: Maximum value of all the pixels in the band

stddev.title: Standard deviation value of all the pixels in the band

items.title: number of pixels in the bucket

github.com_radiantearth_stac-spec_raw_ma.title: STAC Collection Specification
github.com_radiantearth_stac-spec_raw_ma.description: This object represents Collections in a SpatioTemporal Asset Catalog.

collection.title: STAC Collection
collection.description: These are the fields specific to a STAC Collection. All other fields are inherited from STAC Catalog.

items.description: For each field only the original data type of the property can occur (except for arrays), but we can't validate that in JSON Schema yet. See the sumamry description in the STAC specification for details.

github.com_radiantearth_stac-spec_raw_ma.title: STAC Item
github.com_radiantearth_stac-spec_raw_ma.description: This object represents the metadata for an item in a SpatioTemporal Asset Catalog.

collection.title: Collection ID
collection.description: The ID of the STAC Collection this Item references to.

schemas.stacspec.org_v1.0.0_collection-s.title: STAC Collection Specification
schemas.stacspec.org_v1.0.0_collection-s.description: This object represents Collections in a SpatioTemporal Asset Catalog.

collection.title: STAC Collection
collection.description: These are the fields specific to a STAC Collection. All other fields are inherited from STAC Catalog.

items.description: For each field only the original data type of the property can occur (except for arrays), but we can't validate that in JSON Schema yet. See the sumamry description in the STAC specification for details.

schemas.stacspec.org_v1.0.0_item-spec_js.title: STAC Item
schemas.stacspec.org_v1.0.0_item-spec_js.description: This object represents the metadata for an item in a SpatioTemporal Asset Catalog.

collection.title: Collection ID
collection.description: The ID of the STAC Collection this Item references to.

title.title: Item Title
title.description: A human-readable title describing the Item.

description.title: Item Description
description.description: Detailed multi-line description to fully explain the Item.

datetime.title: Date and Time
datetime.description: The searchable date/time of the assets, in UTC (Formatted in RFC 3339)

start_datetime.title: Start Date and Time
start_datetime.description: The searchable start date/time of the assets, in UTC (Formatted in RFC 3339)

end_datetime.title: End Date and Time
end_datetime.description: The searchable end date/time of the assets, in UTC (Formatted in RFC 3339)
